changes: chair_1: Relocated from a pulled-out position to be tucked fully under the table. This is critical to maintain the 'Space Optimized' style's rule of a completely empty central floor.
chair_2: Relocated from a pulled-out position to be tucked fully under the table. This ensures the chair does not encroach on the central open area, adhering to the perimeter layout principle.

refined_placements.chair_1: Tucked fully under table_1, against the top (north) wall.
refined_placements.chair_2: Tucked fully under table_1, against the top (north) wall.
refined_placements.nightstand_1: Against the right (east) wall, placed to the top side (head) of bed_1.
refined_placements.nightstand_2: Against the right (east) wall, placed to the bottom side (foot) of bed_1.
refined_placements.table_1: Against the top (north) wall, between the kitchenette area and the main living space.
refined_placements.sofa_1: Against the left (west) wall, positioned in the lower half of the room.
refined_placements.artwork_1: Mounted on the left (west) wall, centered above sofa_1.
refined_placements.plant_1: Placed in the corner where the top (north) and right (east) walls meet, next to nightstand_1.
refined_placements.artwork_2: Mounted on the right (east) wall, next to nightstand_2.
refined_placements.rug_1: On the floor against the bottom (south) wall, in front of the left window.
refined_placements.rug_2: On the floor against the bottom (south) wall, in front of the right window.
